April, standard physics today defines four fundamental types of forces: ele=
ctromagnetism, gravity,=A0 and the strong and weak interaction of elementar=
y particles.=A0 So while EM is one type of energy (well, lets call it a for=
ce), there are a few others too.


--- On Mon, 6/8/09, April Abercrombie <a=
pril@...> wrote:

From: April Abercrombie <april@a=
bercrombieghostresearch.com>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
To: EVP-ITC@y=
ahoogroups.com
Date: Monday, June 8, 2009, 1:21 PM











    
        =
    
            


      
      


This seems to jive with what I have lea=
rned 
this far, but I am still not certain I understand it completely.
=A0
=
I thought everything was based in the 
electromagnetic spectrum.
=A0

ps .com

 ideas
  

  
  
  
    
    
      
        Tell me where the seperation o=
n the spectrum takes place between 
        300Hz and 300KHz. Yes, soundwav=
es cause pressure waves that our ears 
        read as vibration and our mi=
nd translates as sound. The waves are still 
        on the electromagnetic=
 spectrum. Even subsonic geomagnetic waves are 
        present on the scal=
e. What I mean by power can be directll translated to 
        volume or am=
plitude. The only thing that distinguishes soundwaves from 
        any oth=
er wave is the fact that we can hear them.
        =A0
        Frank R.

--=

          =
  
              No. Sounds waves are not on the electromagnet 
           =
     spectrum nor are they a form of electromagnet energy. Sound 
         =
       waves are based on pressure waves in the air (or in other 
         =
       substances).=A0 Our ears detect these pressure waves and 
          =
      translate them into sounds we here.=A0 Our ear do NOT hear 
         =
       electromagnet energy.=A0 Our eyes do: that part which we call 
     =
           visible light.

 =
                     
                        It sounds like she's saying "=
one, two, ....."
                        =A0
                        A mist=
ake that a lot of people make is thinking 
                        that the=
re are two different types of energy at work 
                        when =
it comes to sound waves and electromagnetic waves. 
                       =
 The only thing that seperates them is frequency and 
                     =
   power. Radio waves are radio waves because they occupy a 
              =
          certain block of the electromagnietic spectrum. Sound 
          =
              waves exist on that same spectrum just farther down with 
   =
                     much longer waves. Soundwaves and subsonic waves can 
=
                        penetrate almost anything because of their waveleng=
ths. 
                        The shorter the wavelength the more ways we c=
an shield 
                        against them.
                        =
=A0
                        Think of microwaves. These are also a type of r=
adio 
                        and telemetry transmitting wave but the waves=
 also have 
                        a physical effect on our environment by=
 causing 
                        molecules to speed up, which creates heat=
. A little 
                        lower than this is IR or infrared it to=
o can cause 
                        physical objects to heat up but usuall=
y it just causes 
                        molecules to rotate in place. All=
 physical things give 
                        off IR light. Its a way the =
total system conserves 
                        energy by spontaneously emi=
tting IR radiation.
                        =A0
                        Fra=
nk R.

                          Here is some food 
                    =
      for thought. I am currently reviewing my audio from 
                =
          our May 30th investigation.
                          =A0
       =
                   It was me and 
                          another girl te=
ammate=A0present in the room. I 
                          picked up a 3rd =
female voice on my digital voice 
                          recorder that I=
 carry with me. We were standing right 
                          next to a=
nother digital video recorder that I leave 
                          besid=
e my night vision camera. That recorder did not 
                          =
pick up this 3rd voice. I have asked the girl that was 
                   =
       with me to check her recording to see if she picked it 
            =
              up.
                          =A0
                          I=
 have long felt 
                          the true EVP does not come from =
sound waves in the 
                          environment, or then it would=
n't be EVP, but a 
                          disembodied voice. Somehow EVP=
's are appearing 
                          directly on the recordings.
   =
                       =A0
                          This instance with 
  =
                        the recorders may back that theory up. That other 
=
                          recorder should have picked that voice up if it w=
ere 
                          sound waves in the environment.
            =
              =A0
                          I am attaching the 
           =
               clip of this 3rd voice. The=A0file that is 
                =
          named=A0"01-02-17 Clip" is the full clip.=A0You 
                =
          will hear my voice as I say "Yeah", and then another 
           =
               comes in right after that. I think I know what it 
         =
                 says.
                          =A0
                      =
    Again, I was live 
                          monitoring my audio, but s=
till did not hear this until 
                          playback. It isn't =
clear, so I am not as excited about 
                          it as my one=
's from the last 
                          investigation.
                =
          =A0

                         =
     
                              
                                
     =
                           I have a running theory that EVP is carried 
   =
                             on an untrasonic wave and demodulated exactly =

                                where they want it to manifest. It works o=
ff the 
                                heterodyne principle. If you mix tw=
o ultrasonic 
                                waves that differ one another=
 in frequency then 
                                if you add or subtract =
them together you get a 
                                beat frequency or =
alternate frequency. For 
                                example, if a gho=
st is sending a signal at 54KHz 
                                and you ha=
ve an electric fan in a room creating 
                                an u=
ntrasonic frequency at 45KHz then you will 
                               =
 have a intermediate difference=A0frequency at 
                           =
     9KHz, well within human hearing range (20Hz to 
                      =
          20KHz). This was just an example, but all 
                      =
          electronic equipment generates ultrasonic 
                      =
          signals just by turning them on. From this 
                     =
           theory I always felt that EVP were generated 
                  =
              within a few inches of the recorder.
                        =
        =A0
                                We are able to reproduce this a=
ffect in not 
                                only radio with superheterody=
ne systems but also 
                                with acoustics and aud=
io as in some passive 
                                sonars and a commerc=
ial produce called the 
                                "audio spotlight" b=
y Dr. Joseph Pompeii.
                                =A0
                 =
               Frank R.

lls of the building. The video for

                   <td valign=3D"top">
                                <div=
>I have a running theory that EVP is carried 
                             =
   on an untrasonic wave and demodulated exactly 
                         =
       where they want it to manifest. It works off the 
                  =
              heterodyne principle. If you mix two ultrasonic 
            =
                    waves that differ one another in frequency then 
      =
                          if you add or subtract them together you get a 
 =
                               beat frequency or alternate frequency. For 
=
                                example, if a ghost is sending a signal at =
54KHz 
                                and you have an electric fan in a ro=
om creating 
                                an untrasonic frequency at 45K=
Hz then you will 
                                have a intermediate diffe=
rence frequency at 
                                9KHz, well within =
human hearing range (20Hz to 
                                20KHz). This =
was just an example, but all 
                                electronic eq=
uipment generates ultrasonic 
                                signals just =
by turning them on. From this 
                                theory I alw=
ays felt that EVP were generated 
                                within a =
few inches of the recorder.</div>
                                <div>&nbs=
p;</div>
                                <div>We are able to reproduce this=
 affect in not 
                                only radio with superhetero=
dyne systems but also 
                                with acoustics and a=
udio as in some passive 
                                sonars and a comme=
rcial produce called the 
                                "audio spotlight"=
 by Dr. Joseph Pompeii.</div>
                                <div> </=
div>

om></i></b>
